episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' features discussions on a variety of intriguing topics, including the history of a famous painting, a peculiar animal behavior, an unusual historical event, and a surprising scientific discovery.

facts.fact: The Mona Lisa has no eyebrows because it was the fashion in Renaissance Florence to shave them off.
Cows have best friends and get stressed when they are separated from them.
In 1815, the eruption of Mount Tambora caused a 'year without a summer' in Europe and North America.
Bananas are berries, but strawberries are not.
